docs.summary: This is summary for 'onFulfillmentsUpdated' is auto generated by metro-service
description: Triggered when one or more of an order's fulfillments are added, updated, or deleted.

docs.summary: This is summary for 'onOrderApproved' is auto generated by metro-service
description: Triggered when an order is created and its status is updated to `"APPROVED"`.

docs.summary: This is summary for 'onOrderCanceled' is auto generated by metro-service
description: Triggered when an order is canceled.

docs.summary: This is summary for 'onOrderPaymentStatusUpdated' is auto generated by metro-service
description: Triggered when an order's payment status is updated to `"PAID"`.

docs.summary: This is summary for 'onOrderTransactionsPayments' is auto generated by metro-service
description: Triggered when a payment is added to an order, or when an existing payment is updated.

docs.summary: This is summary for 'onOrderTransactionsRefunded' is auto generated by metro-service
description: Triggered when a refund is given for a part or all of an order.

members.name: identityType
members.doc:
Customer type
One of:
CONTACT,
MEMBER,
UNSPECIFIED_IDENTITY_TYPE

members.name: type
members.doc:
Deprecated (use identityType instead)
One of:
CONTACT,
MEMBER,
UNSPECIFIED_IDENTITY_TYPE

description: Buyer Info

members.name: orderWithFulfillments
members.doc: Order ID and the orders' fulfillments.

members.name: orderWithFulfillments
members.doc: Order ID and the orders' associated fulfillments after deletion.

description: for now, this is a sub-object of Orders, so can refer to order line items by id.

members.name: fulfillmentId
members.doc: ID of the newly created fulfillment.

members.name: fulfillmentStatus
members.doc:
Order fulfillment status.
One of:
CANCELED,
FULFILLED,
NOT_FULFILLED,
PARTIALLY_FULFILLED

members.name: orderId
members.doc: Order ID (auto generated upon order creation).

members.name: fulfillmentStatus
members.doc:
Order fulfillment status.
One of:
CANCELED,
FULFILLED,
NOT_FULFILLED,
PARTIALLY_FULFILLED

members.name: orderId
members.doc: Order ID (auto generated upon order creation).

members.name: _id
members.doc: Line item ID (mirrors the ID of the order line item).

members.name: quantity
members.doc:
Line item quantity.
* On creation, if this parameter isn't passed, the new fulfillment will automatically include all items of this line item that have not already been linked to a fulfillment.
* If the order does not have the requested quantity of line items available to add to this fulfillment, the fulfillment will not be created and an error will be returned.
* This property will always have a value when returned.

members.name: shippingProvider
members.doc:
Shipping provider. Using the following shipping providers will allow for auto-filling the tracking link:
* `fedex`
* `ups`
* `usps`
* `dhl`
* `canadaPost`

members.name: trackingLink
members.doc: Tracking link - auto-filled if using a predefined shipping provider, otherwise provided on creation.

members.name: orderId
members.doc: Order ID (auto generated upon order creation).

members.name: orderIds
members.doc: Order IDs for which to retrieve fulfillments.

members.name: ordersWithFulfillments
members.doc: List of order IDs and their associated fulfillments.

members.name: orderId
members.doc: Order ID for which to retrieve fulfillments.

members.name: orderWithFulfillments
members.doc: List of fulfillments associated with the order.

members.name: fieldMask
members.doc: Set of fields to update. Fields that aren't included in `fieldMask.paths` are ignored.

members.name: orderWithFulfillments
members.doc: Order ID and the orders' associated fulfillments after update.

members.name: shippingProvider
members.doc:
Shipping provider. Using the following shipping providers will allow for autofilling the tracking link:
* `fedex`
* `ups`
* `usps`
* `dhl`
* `canadaPost`

members.name: trackingLink
members.doc: Tracking link - autofilled if using a predefined shipping provider, otherwise provided on creation.

members.name: orderRefunded
members.doc: Additional info about order refunded activity (optional). `activity.type` must be `ORDER_REFUNDED`.

members.name: type
members.doc:
Activity type.
One of:
CUSTOM_ACTIVITY,
DOWNLOAD_LINK_SENT,
EMAIL_EDITED,
FULFILLER_EMAIL_SENT,
INVOICE_ADDED,
INVOICE_REMOVED,
INVOICE_SENT,
MERCHANT_COMMENT,
NEW_EXCHANGE_ORDER_CREATED,
ORDER_CANCELED,
ORDER_CREATED_FROM_EXCHANGE,
ORDER_FULFILLED,
ORDER_NOT_FULFILLED,
ORDER_PAID,
ORDER_PLACED,
ORDER_REFUNDED,
PICKUP_READY_EMAIL_SENT,
SHIPPING_ADDRESS_EDITED,
SHIPPING_CONFIRMATION_EMAIL_SENT,
TRACKING_LINK_ADDED,
TRACKING_NUMBER_ADDED,
TRACKING_NUMBER_EDITED

members.name: activityId
members.doc:
ID of the added activity.
Use this ID to either [update](https://bo.wix.com/wix-docs/rest/ecommerce/orders/update-activity) or [delete](https://bo.wix.com/wix-docs/rest/ecommerce/orders/delete-activity) the activity.

members.name: activityId
members.doc:
ID of the added internal activity.
Use this ID to either [update](https://bo.wix.com/wix-docs/rest/ecommerce/orders/update-activity) or [delete](https://bo.wix.com/wix-docs/rest/ecommerce/orders/delete-activity) the activity.

members.name: addressLine
members.doc: Main address line (usually street name and number).

members.name: addressLine2
members.doc: Free text providing more detailed address info. Usually contains apt, suite, floor.

members.name: streetAddress
members.doc: Street address object, with number, name, and apartment number in separate fields.

members.name: subdivision
members.doc: Code for a subdivision (such as state, prefecture, or province) in [ISO 3166-2](https://www.iso.org/standard/72483.html) format.

description: Physical address
Billing Info and shipping details

members.name: aggregation
members.doc: This is an object defining aggregation itself

members.name: discountType
members.doc:
Discount type.
* `"GLOBAL"` - discount applies to entire order.
* `"SPECIFIC-ITEMS"` - discount applies to specific items.
* `"SHIPPING"` - discount applies to shipping. For example, free shipping.
One of:
GLOBAL,
SHIPPING,
SPECIFIC_ITEMS

members.name: lineItemIds
members.doc: IDs of line items discount applies to.

members.name: totalFailures
members.doc: For how many items the requested action was not successful

members.name: totalSuccesses
members.doc: For how many items the requested action was successful

members.name: undetailedFailures
members.doc: total number of failures without details because detailed-failure-threshold exceeded

members.name: filter
members.doc: Filter object. Learn more about supported filters [here](https://bo.wix.com/wix-docs/rest/ecommerce/orders/filter-and-sort).

members.name: returnFullEntity
members.doc: Whether to return the full updated order entities in the response.

members.name: filter
members.doc: Filter object. Learn more about supported filters [here](https://bo.wix.com/wix-docs/rest/ecommerce/orders/filter-and-sort).

members.name: ids
members.doc: IDs of orders to be marked as fulfilled.

members.name: returnFullEntity
members.doc: Whether to return the full updated order entities in the response.

members.name: filter
members.doc: Filter object. Learn more about supported filters [here](https://bo.wix.com/wix-docs/rest/ecommerce/orders/filter-and-sort).

members.name: ids
members.doc: IDs of orders to be marked as not fulfilled.

members.name: returnFullEntity
members.doc: Whether to return the full updated order entities in the response.

members.name: ids
members.doc: IDs of orders to mark as paid.

members.name: results
members.doc:
Items updated by the bulk action.
The Order entity within the results optimistically changes its payment status to paid, however this process is async.

members.name: item
members.doc: Updated item. Optional - returned only if requested with `return_full_entity` set to `true`.

members.name: filter
members.doc: Filter object. Learn more about supported filters [here](https://bo.wix.com/wix-docs/rest/ecommerce/orders/filter-and-sort).

members.name: returnFullEntity
members.doc: Whether to return the full updated order entities in the response.

members.name: contactId
members.doc: Contact ID. Auto-created if one does not yet exist. For more information, see [Contacts API](https://dev.wix.com/api/rest/contacts/contacts/introduction).

members.name: memberId
members.doc: Member ID (if site visitor is a site member).

members.name: visitorId
members.doc: Visitor ID (if site visitor is not a member).

description: Buyer Info

members.name: customMessage
members.doc: Custom note to be added to the email (optional).

members.name: restockAllItems
members.doc: Whether to restock all items in the order.

members.name: sendOrderCanceledEmail
members.doc: Whether to send an order canceled email to the buyer.

members.name: appId
members.doc: ID of the catalog app. For example, the Wix Stores `appId`, or the 3rd-party `appId`.

members.name: catalogItemId
members.doc: ID of the item within its Wix or 3rd-party catalog. For example, `productId` for Wix Stores or `eventId` for Wix Events.

members.name: options
members.doc: Additional info in key:value form. For example, `{"options":{"Size": "M", "Color": "Red"}}` or `{"variantId": "<VARIANT_ID>"}`.

description: Used for grouping line items and is sent on add to cart

members.name: externalOrderId
members.doc: Reference to an order ID from an external system.

members.name: externalOrderUrl
members.doc: URL to the order in the external system.

members.name: type
members.doc:
Sales channel that submitted the order.
One of:
AMAZON,
BACKOFFICE_MERCHANT,
EBAY,
OTHER_PLATFORM,
POS,
UNSPECIFIED,
WEB,
WISH,
WIX_APP_STORE,
WIX_INVOICES

members.name: code
members.doc: Optional - HEX or RGB color code for display.

members.name: original
members.doc: Optional - Description line color name in site's default language.

members.name: translated
members.doc: Optional - Translated description line color name according to buyer language. Defaults to `original` when not provided.

description: Coupon

members.name: paymentGatewayOrderId
members.doc: ID of the order created in the payment gateway

members.name: appId
members.doc: App ID - when the order was created by an external application.

members.name: memberId
members.doc: Member ID - when the order was created by a **logged in** site visitor.

members.name: userId
members.doc:
User ID - when the order was created by a Wix user on behalf of a buyer.
For example, via POS (point of service).

members.name: visitorId
members.doc: Visitor ID - when the order was created by a site visitor that was **not** logged in.

members.name: cursor
members.doc: Pointer to the next or previous page in the list of results.

members.name: next
members.doc: Cursor pointing to next page in the list of results.

members.name: prev
members.doc: Cursor pointing to previous page in the list of results.

members.name: additionalData
members.doc: Additional data in key-value form. For example, `{ "Ticket number": "123456" }`.

members.name: appId
members.doc: ID of the app that created the custom activity.

members.name: type
members.doc: Custom activity type. For example, `"Ticket number set"`.

members.name: lineItemId
members.doc: ID of the line item being decremented.

members.name: restock
members.doc: Whether to restock the line item (triggers inventory update).

members.name: decrementData
members.doc: Which items to decrement, and how much to decrement from each one

members.name: activityId
members.doc: ID of the activity to delete.

members.name: deliveryTime
members.doc: Expected delivery time in free text. For example, `"3-5 business days"`.

members.name: instructions
members.doc: Instructions for carrier. For example, `"Please knock on the door. If unanswered, please call contact number. Thanks."`.

members.name: original
members.doc: Optional - Description line name in site's default language.

members.name: translated
members.doc: Optional - Translated description line item according to buyer language. Defaults to `original` when not provided.

members.name: fileId
members.doc: ID of the secure file in media.

members.name: link
members.doc: Link will exist after the digital links have been generated on the order.

members.name: original
members.doc: Original discount rule name (in site's default language).

members.name: translated
members.doc: Translated discount rule name according to buyer language

members.name: _id
members.doc: random GUID so clients can tell if event was already handled

members.name: entityFqdn
members.doc:
Assumes actions are also always typed to an entity_type
Example: wix.stores.catalog.product, wix.bookings.session, wix.payments.transaction

members.name: entityId
members.doc:
Assuming that all messages including Actions have id
Example: The id of the specific order, the id of a specific campaign

members.name: eventTime
members.doc: The time of the event. Useful if there was a delay in dipatching

members.name: originatedFrom
members.doc: If present, indicates the action that triggered the event.

members.name: slug
members.doc:
This is top level to ease client code dipatching of messages (switch on entity_fqdn+slug)
This is although the created/updated/deleted notion is duplication of the oneof types
Example: created/updated/deleted/started/completed/email_opened

members.name: triggeredByAnonymizeRequest
members.doc:
A field that should be set if this event was triggered by an anonymize request.
For example you must set it to true when sending an event as a result of a GDPR right to be forgotten request.
NOTE: This field is not relevant for `EntityCreatedEvent` but is located here for better ergonomics of consumers.

description: A download link was sent (relevant for orders with digital line items)
Order email was updated

members.name: currentEntityAsJson
members.doc:
Since platformized APIs only expose PATCH and not PUT we can't assume that the fields sent from the client are the actual diff.
This means that to generate a list of changed fields (as opposed to sent fields) one needs to traverse both objects.
We don't want to impose this on all developers and so we leave this traversal to the notification recipients which need it.

description: Email was sent to fulfiller

members.name: action
members.doc: the action that caused this update

members.name: newFulfillmentStatus
members.doc:
the new status (after the update)
One of:
FULFILLED,
NOT_FULFILLED,
PARTIALLY_FULFILLED

members.name: previousFulfillmentStatus
members.doc:
The previous status (before the update)
One of:
FULFILLED,
NOT_FULFILLED,
PARTIALLY_FULFILLED

description: Triggered when the fulfillment status of an order is updated

members.name: vatId
members.doc: Tax information (for Brazil only). If ID is provided, `vatId.type` must also be set - UNSPECIFIED is not allowed.

description: Full contact details for an address

members.name: _id
members.doc: ID of the order to retrieve.

members.name: _createdDate
members.doc: Internal activity creation date and time.

members.name: downloadLinkSent
members.doc: Download link was sent (relevant for orders with digital line items).

members.name: invoiceSent
members.doc: Invoice sent to customer via email.

members.name: orderCreatedFromExchange
members.doc: Order created as a result of items exchange.

members.name: orderFulfilled
members.doc: Order shipping status set as fulfilled.

members.name: orderNotFulfilled
members.doc: Order shipping status set as not fulfilled.

members.name: orderPaid
members.doc: Order paid. Either by the store owner (for offline orders), or when an online transaction was confirmed.

members.name: shippingConfirmationEmailSent
members.doc: An email confirmation of order shipment was sent.

members.name: trackingLinkAdded
members.doc: Shipping tracking link added to order.

members.name: trackingNumberAdded
members.doc: Shipping tracking number added to order.

description: Invoice was set in the order
Invoice sent to customer via email

members.name: _id
members.doc: Item id. Should always be provided, unless it's impossible (e.g when failing to create an item)

members.name: error
members.doc: In case of failure, details about the error

members.name: originalIndex
members.doc: The index of the item within the request array to allow the caller to correlate the request and response items

members.name: success
members.doc: Whether the action requested was successful for this item. When this value is false, error should be populated

members.name: taxRate
members.doc: Tax rate percentage, as a decimal numeral between 0 and 1. For example, `"0.13"`.

members.name: taxableAmount
members.doc: Taxable amount of this line item.

members.name: totalTax
members.doc: The calculated tax, based on the `taxableAmount` and `taxRate`.

members.name: preset
members.doc:
Preset item type.
One of:
DIGITAL,
GIFT_CARD,
PHYSICAL,
SERVICE,
UNRECOGNISED

members.name: lineItemId
members.doc: ID of the exchanged line item.

members.name: descriptionLines
members.doc:
Description lines' info.
If description line already exists for this name, it will be replaced.

description: Store owner added a comment

members.name: discountReason
members.doc:
Pre-defined discount reason (optional).
* `"ITEMS_EXCHANGE"` - exchange balance acquired as a result of items exchange.
One of:
EXCHANGED_ITEMS,
UNSPECIFIED

members.name: exchangeOrderId
members.doc: ID of the new order created as a result of an exchange of items.

members.name: lineItems
members.doc: IDs of the items that were exchanged.

members.name: _updatedDate
members.doc: Date and time of order's latest update.

members.name: attributionSource
members.doc:
Order attribution source.
One of:
FACEBOOK_ADS,
UNSPECIFIED

members.name: buyerLanguage
members.doc:
Language to be used when communicating with the customer.
For a site that supports multiple languages, this is the language the customer selected (otherwise this defaults to the site language).

members.name: buyerNote
members.doc: A note added by the buyer.

members.name: channelInfo
members.doc: Information about the sales channel that submitted this order.

members.name: currency
members.doc: Currency used for pricing in this store.

members.name: fulfillmentStatus
members.doc:
Order fulfillment status.
One of:
FULFILLED,
NOT_FULFILLED,
PARTIALLY_FULFILLED

members.name: number
members.doc: Order number displayed in the site owner's business manager (auto-generated).

members.name: paymentStatus
members.doc:
Order payment status.
+ `NOT_PAID` - This can be an order made online, but not yet paid. In such cases `order.status` will be `INITIALIZED`.
+ This status also applies when an offline order needs to be manually marked as paid. In such cases `order.status` will be `APPROVED`.
+ `PAID` - All payments associated with this order are paid. For online payments: [`payment.regularPaymentDetails.status: APPROVED`](https://bo.wix.com/wix-docs/rest/ecommerce/order-payments/order-transactions-object). For gift cards: [`payment.giftCardPaymentDetails.voided: false`](https://bo.wix.com/wix-docs/rest/ecommerce/order-payments/order-transactions-object).
+ `PARTIALLY_REFUNDED` - Order was refunded, but refund amount is less than order total price.
+ `FULLY_REFUNDED` - Order fully refunded. Refund amount equals total price.
+ `PENDING` - Payments received but not yet confirmed by the payment provider.
One of:
FULLY_REFUNDED,
NOT_PAID,
PAID,
PARTIALLY_REFUNDED,
PENDING,
UNSPECIFIED

members.name: seenByAHuman
members.doc: Whether a human has seen the order. Set when an order is clicked on in the Business Manager.

members.name: shippingInfo
members.doc: Shipping info and selected shipping option details.

members.name: siteLanguage
members.doc: Site language in which original values are shown.

members.name: status
members.doc:
Order status.
+ `INITIALIZED` - Order was created, but not yet approved or declined.
+ `APPROVED` - Order was approved. This happens when either the online payment succeeded or the order is an offline order.
+ Once an order is approved, many side effects are triggered. For example, holding of stock in the inventory and sending of notification emails.
+ `CANCELED` - Order was canceled by the user.
One of:
APPROVED,
CANCELED,
INITIALIZED

members.name: taxIncludedInPrices
members.doc: Whether tax is included in line item prices.

members.name: weightUnit
members.doc:
Weight measurement unit - defaults to site's weight unit.
One of:
KG,
LB,
UNSPECIFIED_WEIGHT_UNIT

description: Triggered when the the order status changes to approved
Order canceled

members.name: customMessage
members.doc: Personal note added to the email

members.name: restockAllItems
members.doc: Should restock all items on that order

members.name: sendOrderCanceledEmail
members.doc: Should send a confirmation mail to the customer

members.name: originalOrderId
members.doc: ID of the original order for which the exchange happened.

description: Order shipping status set as fulfilled

members.name: order
members.doc: The order which items were restocked

description: Triggered when order items are marked as restocked

members.name: catalogReference
members.doc:
References to the line item's origin catalog.
See [Catalog SPI](https://bo.wix.com/wix-docs/rest/ecommerce/catalog-spi/introduction) for more details.
This field is empty in the case of a custom line item.

members.name: descriptionLines
members.doc: Line item description lines. Used for display purposes for the cart, checkout and order.

members.name: fulfillerId
members.doc:
Fulfiller ID. Field is empty when the line item is self-fulfilled.
To get fulfillment information, pass this order's ID to [List Fulfillments For Single Order](https://bo.wix.com/wix-docs/rest/ecommerce/order-fulfillments/list-fulfillments-for-single-order).

members.name: itemType
members.doc: Item type. Either a preset type or custom.

members.name: paymentOption
members.doc:
Type of selected payment option for current item. Defaults to `FULL_PAYMENT_ONLINE`.
+ `FULL_PAYMENT_ONLINE` - The entire payment for this item happens as part of the checkout.
+ `FULL_PAYMENT_OFFLINE` - The entire payment for this item happens after the checkout. For example, when using cash, cheque, or other offline payment methods.
+ `MEMBERSHIP` - Payment for this item is done by charging a membership. When this option is used, `lineItem.price.amount` will be 0.
One of:
FULL_PAYMENT_OFFLINE,
FULL_PAYMENT_ONLINE,
MEMBERSHIP

members.name: physicalProperties
members.doc: Physical properties of the item. When relevant, contains information such as SKU and item weight.

members.name: price
members.doc: Line item price for display purposes.

members.name: priceDescription
members.doc: Additional description for the price. For example, when price is 0 but additional details about the actual price are needed - "Starts at $67".

members.name: restockQuantity
members.doc: quantity of inventory requested to be returned. Whether to restock or ignore the request is up the vertical.

members.name: taxDetails
members.doc: Tax details for this line item.

members.name: totalDiscount
members.doc: Total discount for this line item's entire quantity.

members.name: totalPriceAfterTax
members.doc: Total price after all discounts and tax.

members.name: totalPriceBeforeTax
members.doc: Total price after all discounts, before tax.

description: Order shipping status set as not fulfilled
Order marked as paid, either by the store owner (for offline orders), or when an online transaction was confirmed
Order placed

members.name: manual
members.doc: Whether order was refunded manually. For example, via payment provider or using cash.

members.name: previousPaymentStatus
members.doc:
The previous status (before the update)
One of:
FULLY_REFUNDED,
NOT_PAID,
PAID,
PARTIALLY_REFUNDED,
PENDING,
UNSPECIFIED

description: Triggered when the payment status of an order is updated

members.name: shippable
members.doc: Whether this line item is shippable.

members.name: weight
members.doc: Line item weight. Measurement unit (KG or LB) is taken from `order.weightUnit`.

members.name: addressLine
members.doc: Main address line (usually street name and number).

members.name: addressLine2
members.doc: Free text providing more detailed address info. Usually contains apt, suite, floor.

members.name: streetAddress
members.doc: Street address object, with number, name, and apartment number in separate fields.

members.name: subdivision
members.doc: Code for a subdivision (such as state, prefecture, or province) in [ISO 3166-2](https://www.iso.org/standard/72483.html) format.

description: Physical address

members.name: pickupMethod
members.doc:
Pickup method
One of:
PICKUP_POINT,
STORE_PICKUP,
UNKNOWN_METHOD

description: An email notification for pickup was sent

members.name: original
members.doc: Optional - Description line plain text value in site's default language.

members.name: translated
members.doc: Optional - Translated description line plain text value according to buyer language. Defaults to `original` when not provided.

members.name: offset
members.doc: Number of items to skip in the current sort order.

members.name: count
members.doc: The number of items returned in this response.

members.name: cursors
members.doc: Cursors to navigate through result pages. Returned if cursor paging was used.

members.name: offset
members.doc: The offset which was requested. Returned if offset paging was used.

members.name: total
members.doc: The total number of items that match the query. Returned if offset paging was used.

members.name: cursorPaging
members.doc: Cursor pointing to page of results. Cannot be used together with `paging`. `cursorPaging.cursor` can not be used together with `filter` or `sort`.

members.name: paging
members.doc: Pointer to page of results using offset. Cannot be used together with `cursorPaging`.

members.name: original
members.doc: Required** - Original price description (in site's default language).

members.name: translated
members.doc: Optional - Translated product name according to buyer language. Defaults to `original` when not provided.

members.name: shipping
members.doc: Total shipping price, before discounts and before tax.

members.name: subtotal
members.doc: Subtotal of all the line items, before discounts and before tax.

members.name: totalPrice
members.doc: Order's total price after discounts, gift cards, and tax.

members.name: original
members.doc: Required** - Original product name (in site's default language).

members.name: translated
members.doc: Optional - Translated product name according to buyer language. Defaults to `original` when not provided.

members.name: metadata
members.doc: Details on the paged set of results returned.

members.name: lineItemId
members.doc: ID of the line item being restocked.

description: Shipping address was updated
An email confirmation of order shipment was sent

members.name: carrierId
members.doc: App Def Id of external provider which was a source of shipping info

members.name: code
members.doc: Unique code (or ID) of selected shipping option. For example, `"usps_std_overnight"``.

members.name: title
members.doc:
Shipping option title.
For example, `"USPS Standard Overnight Delivery"`, `"Standard"` or `"First-Class Package International"`.

members.name: totalPriceAfterTax
members.doc: Shipping price after all discounts (if any exist), and after tax.

members.name: totalPriceBeforeTax
members.doc: Shipping price after all discounts (if any exist), before tax.

members.name: name
members.doc: Name of shipping region. For example, `"Metropolitan London"`, or `"Outer Melbourne suburbs"`.

members.name: fieldName
members.doc: Name of the field to sort by.

members.name: order
members.doc:
Sort order.
One of:
ASC,
DESC

members.name: cycleNumber
members.doc: Subscription cycle. For example, if this order is for the 3rd cycle of a subscription, value will be `3`.

members.name: subscriptionOptionDescription
members.doc: Subscription option description. For example, `"1kg of selected coffee, once a month"`.

members.name: subscriptionOptionTitle
members.doc: Subscription option title. For example, `"Monthly coffee Subscription"`.

description: Shipping tracking link was set
Shipping tracking number was set
Shipping tracking number was edited

members.name: activityId
members.doc: ID of the activity to update.

members.name: shippingAddress
members.doc: Shipping address and contact details to be updated.

members.name: type
members.doc:
tax type
One of:
CNPJ,
CPF,
UNSPECIFIED

members.name: type
members.doc:
Activity item type
One of:
DOWNLOAD_LINK_SENT,
EMAIL_EDITED,
FULFILLER_EMAIL_SENT,
INVOICE_WAS_REMOVED,
INVOICE_WAS_SENT,
INVOICE_WAS_SET,
MERCHANT_COMMENT,
ORDER_FULFILLED,
ORDER_NOT_FULFILLED,
ORDER_PAID,
ORDER_PLACED,
PICKUP_READY_EMAIL_SENT,
SHIPPING_ADDRESS_EDITED,
SHIPPING_CONFIRMATION_EMAIL_SENT,
TRACKING_LINK_WAS_SET,
TRACKING_NUMBER_ADDED,
TRACKING_NUMBER_EDITED,
UNSPECIFIED_ORDER_HISTORY_ITEM_TYPE

members.name: payments
members.doc: Payments to be added to order.

members.name: orderTransactions
members.doc: Order ID and its associated transactions.

members.name: paymentGatewayTransactionId
members.doc: Transaction ID from payment gateway (e.g., Wix Payments)

members.name: paymentMethod
members.doc: Payment method used for this order

members.name: paymentProviderTransactionId
members.doc: Transaction ID from payment provider (e.g., PayPal, Square, Stripe) transaction ID

members.name: refundableByPaymentProvider
members.doc: Whether order can be refunded by payment provider (manually or automatic)

members.name: totalFailures
members.doc: For how many items the requested action was not successful

members.name: totalSuccesses
members.doc: For how many items the requested action was successful

members.name: undetailedFailures
members.doc: total number of failures without details because detailed-failure-threshold exceeded

members.name: item
members.doc: Updated payment. Returned if `return_full_entity` set to `true`.

members.name: paymentAndOrderIds
members.doc: Order and payment IDs for which to update payment status.

members.name: returnFullEntity
members.doc: Whether to return the full payment entity (`results.item`) in the response.

members.name: status
members.doc:
Payment status.
One of:
APPROVED,
AUTHORIZED,
CANCELED,
DECLINED,
PARTIALLY_REFUNDED,
PENDING,
PENDING_MERCHANT,
REFUNDED,
UNDEFINED

members.name: identityType
members.doc:
Customer type
One of:
CONTACT,
MEMBER,
UNSPECIFIED_IDENTITY_TYPE

members.name: type
members.doc:
Deprecated (use identityType instead)
One of:
CONTACT,
MEMBER,
UNSPECIFIED_IDENTITY_TYPE

description: Buyer Info

members.name: lineItemId
members.doc: ID of the line item being refunded

members.name: quantity
members.doc: How much of that line item is being refunded

members.name: restock
members.doc: Should this item be restocked (used for validation purposes)

members.name: refundShipping
members.doc: Should include shipping in refund calculation

members.name: items
members.doc: The refundable items of that order

members.name: previouslyRefundedAmount
members.doc: Previous refund given on that order

members.name: subtotal
members.doc: Total cost of the order (without tax)

members.name: externalOrderId
members.doc: Reference to an order ID from an external system, as defined in channelInfo (e.g., eBay or Amazon)

members.name: externalOrderUrl
members.doc: URL to the order in the external system, as defined in channelInfo (e.g., eBay or Amazon)

members.name: type
members.doc:
Sales channel that submitted the order
One of:
AMAZON,
BACKOFFICE_MERCHANT,
EBAY,
OTHER_PLATFORM,
POS,
UNSPECIFIED,
WEB,
WISH,
WIX_APP_STORE,
WIX_INVOICES

members.name: translatedTitle
members.doc: The title translated according to the buyer language

members.name: value
members.doc: Free text that the customer entered in the custom field during the checkout process

description: Custom field

members.name: fileId
members.doc: id of the secure file in media

members.name: identityType
members.doc:
One of:
APP,
CONTACT,
MEMBER,
USER

members.name: _id
members.doc: Fulfillment ID (auto generated upon fulfillment creation).

members.name: lineItems
members.doc: Information about the line items in the fulfilled order.

members.name: index
members.doc: Line item ID (mirrors the line item index of the order).

members.name: quantity
members.doc:
Line item quantity.
On creation, if this parameter isn't passed, the new fulfillment will automatically include all items of this line item that have not already been linked to a fulfillment.
If the order does not have the requested quantity of line items available to add to this fulfillment, the fulfillment will not be created and an error will be returned.
This property will always have a value when returned.

members.name: shippingProvider
members.doc:
Shipping provider. Using the following shipping providers will allow for autofilling the tracking link:
* `fedex`
* `ups`
* `usps`
* `dhl`
* `canadaPost`

members.name: trackingLink
members.doc: Tracking link - autofilled if using a predefined shipping provider, otherwise provided on creation.

members.name: refundablePerItem
members.doc: Whether the order supports refunding per item.

members.name: appId
members.doc: ID of the app that created the gift card.

members.name: voided
members.doc: Whether the gift card is voided.

members.name: appId
members.doc: ID of the app that set the invoice.

members.name: _id
members.doc: Item id. Should always be provided, unless it's impossible (e.g when failing to create an item)

members.name: error
members.doc: In case of failure, details about the error

members.name: originalIndex
members.doc: The index of the item within the request array to allow the caller to correlate the request and response items

members.name: success
members.doc: Whether the action requested was successful for this item. When this value is false, error should be populated

members.name: customTextFields
members.doc: Line item custom text field entry

members.name: discount
members.doc: Discount applied for this line item

members.name: fulfillerId
members.doc: Line item fulfillerId from stores fulfillers. No value equals self fulfilled

members.name: index
members.doc: Line item ID (auto-generated, stable within this order only)

members.name: lineItemType
members.doc:
Line item type (may be extended)
One of:
CUSTOM_AMOUNT_ITEM,
DIGITAL,
PHYSICAL,
UNSPECIFIED_LINE_ITEM_TYPE

members.name: mediaItem
members.doc: Primary media for preview of the line item

members.name: productId
members.doc: Line item product ID (optional for POS orders)

members.name: tax
members.doc: Tax applied for this line item

members.name: translatedName
members.doc: Product name, translated into the customer's language

members.name: taxIncludedInPrice
members.doc: Whether tax is included in the price set for this line item

members.name: totalPrice
members.doc: Total price charged to the customer (per line item) after computation of quantity and discount

members.name: orderIds
members.doc: Order IDs for which to retrieve invoices.

members.name: invoicesForOrder
members.doc: List of order IDs and their associated invoices.

members.name: orderIds
members.doc: Order IDs for which to retrieve transactions.

members.name: orderTransactions
members.doc: List of order IDs and their associated transactions.

members.name: orderTransactions
members.doc: Order ID and its associated transactions.

members.name: _id
members.doc: Media ID (for media items previously saved in Wix Media)

members.name: altText
members.doc: Alternative text for presentation when media cannot be displayed

members.name: mediaType
members.doc:
Media type
One of:
IMAGE,
UNSPECIFIED_MEDIA_TYPE_ITEM

members.name: translated
members.doc: Optional - Translated name of this membership. Defaults to `original` when not provided.

members.name: externalTransactionId
members.doc: The transaction id under the membership system. Can be used to void it

members.name: lineItemId
members.doc: ID of the line item this membership applies to.

members.name: providerAppId
members.doc: ID of the application providing this payment option

members.name: status
members.doc:
Payment status
One of:
CHARGED,
CHARGE_FAILED

members.name: activities
members.doc: Log of updates related to the order.

members.name: archived
members.doc: Whether or not the order was archived.

members.name: buyerLanguage
members.doc:
Language to be used when communicating with the customer.
For a site that supports multiple languages, this is the language the customer selected (otherwise this defaults to the site language).

members.name: buyerNote
members.doc: A note added by the buyer.

members.name: channelInfo
members.doc: Information about the sales channel that submitted this order.

members.name: currency
members.doc: Currency used for pricing in this store.

members.name: fulfillmentStatus
members.doc:
Order's current fulfillment status (whether the order received a tracking number or was delivered/picked up).
One of:
CANCELED,
FULFILLED,
NOT_FULFILLED,
PARTIALLY_FULFILLED

members.name: lastUpdated
members.doc: Date and time of latest update.

members.name: number
members.doc: Order number displayed in the owner's store (auto-generated).

members.name: numericId
members.doc:
Order’s unique numeric ID.
Primarily used for sorting and filtering when crawling all orders.

members.name: paymentStatus
members.doc:
Current status of the payment.
One of:
FULLY_REFUNDED,
NOT_PAID,
PAID,
PARTIALLY_REFUNDED,
PENDING,
UNSPECIFIED_PAYMENT_STATUS

members.name: weightUnit
members.doc:
Weight unit used in this store.
One of:
KG,
LB,
UNSPECIFIED_WEIGHT_UNIT

members.name: _createdDate
members.doc: Payment creation date and time. Defaults to current time when not provided.

members.name: refundDisabled
members.doc:
Whether refunds are explicitly disabled.
True means this payment is not refundable.
False means this payment might be refunded (depending on the payment provider).

members.name: amount
members.doc: Refund amount. Not relevant for membership refunds.

members.name: externalRefund
members.doc:
Whether refund is made externally and manually (on the payment provider's side)
When false (default), the payment gateway will be called in order to make an actual refund, and then the payment will be marked as refunded.
When true, the payment will only be *marked* as refunded, and no actual refund will be performed.

members.name: paymentId
members.doc: Specific payment within the order to refund

description: Triggered when a payment is updated.

members.name: _createdDate
members.doc: Refund creation date and time. Defaults to current time when not provided.

members.name: customMessage
members.doc: Personal note added to the email

members.name: refundItems
members.doc: Refunded line items and quantities that are part of the created refund.

members.name: restockInfo
members.doc: How to restock items as part of this refund.

members.name: sendOrderRefundedEmail
members.doc: Should send a confirmation mail to the customer

description: Triggered when a refund is created.

members.name: reason
members.doc: Reason for refund, given by user (optional).

members.name: shippingIncluded
members.doc: Whether shipping rate is also refunded.

description: Business model of a refund request

members.name: lineItemId
members.doc: ID of the line item being refunded.

members.name: externalRefund
members.doc: Whether refund was made externally and manually (on the payment provider's side).

members.name: gatewayRefundId
members.doc: ID of the payment gateway refund.

members.name: paymentId
members.doc: ID of the payment associated with this refund.

members.name: providerRefundId
members.doc: ID of the refund in the payment provider's system.

members.name: refundStatus
members.doc:
Refund status.
One of:
FAILED,
PENDING,
SUCCEEDED

members.name: manuallyRefundableReason
members.doc:
Reason why payment is only refundable manually.
One of:
EXPIRED,
NOT_FOUND,
NOT_SUPPORTED,
OFFLINE

members.name: nonRefundableReason
members.doc:
Reason why payment is not refundable.
One of:
ACCESS_DENIED,
ALREADY_REFUNDED,
DISABLED_BY_PROVIDER,
INTERNAL_ERROR,
NONE,
NOT_PAID,
PROVIDER_IS_DOWN,
ZERO_PRICE

members.name: refundabilityStatus
members.doc:
Payment refundability status.
One of:
MANUAL,
NOT_REFUNDABLE,
REFUNDABLE

members.name: gatewayTransactionId
members.doc: Transaction ID from payment gateway (e.g., Wix Payments, chargeId), what we used to call payment_gateway_transaction_id

members.name: offlinePayment
members.doc: Whether the payment is/was made offline. For example, when using cash or when marked as paid in the Business Manager.

members.name: paymentMethod
members.doc:
Payment method. Non-exhaustive list of supported values:
CreditCard, Alipay, AstropayCash, AstropayDBT, AstropayMBT, Bitcoin, BitPay, Cash, ConvenienceStore, EPay, Fake, Giropay, IDeal, InPerson,
Klarna, MercadoPago, Netpay, NordeaSolo, Offline, PagSeguro, PayEasy, PayPal, Paysafecard, Paysafecash, PointOfSale, Poli,
Privat24, Przelewy24, RapidTransfer, Sepa, Skrill, Sofort, Trustly,Neteller, Unionpay, UniPay, Yandex.

members.name: providerTransactionId
members.doc: Transaction ID in the payment provider's system (for example, PayPal, Square, Stripe). Does not exist for offline payments.

members.name: status
members.doc:
Payment status.
One of:
APPROVED,
AUTHORIZED,
CANCELED,
DECLINED,
PARTIALLY_REFUNDED,
PENDING,
PENDING_MERCHANT,
REFUNDED,
UNDEFINED

members.name: items
members.doc: Restocked line items and quantities, only relevant for `SOME_ITEMS` type.

members.name: type
members.doc:
Restock policy type.
One of:
ALL_ITEMS,
NO_ITEMS,
SOME_ITEMS

members.name: lineItemId
members.doc: ID of the line item being restocked.

members.name: code
members.doc: Unique code of provided shipping option. For example, `"usps_std_overnight"`.

members.name: pickupDetails
members.doc: Pickup details (when this object describes pickup).

members.name: shipmentDetails
members.doc: Shipment details (when this object describes shipment).

members.name: taxIncludedInPrice
members.doc: Whether tax is included in the price.

members.name: cycleNumber
members.doc: Current cycle number. For example, if the subscription is in the 3rd month of a 4-month subscription, the value will be `3`.

members.name: autoRenewal
members.doc: Whether subscription is renewed automatically at the end of each period.

members.name: billingCycles
members.doc: Number of billing cycles before subscription ends. Ignored if `autoRenewal: true`.

members.name: frequency
members.doc:
Frequency of recurring payment.
One of:
DAY,
MONTH,
UNDEFINED,
WEEK,
YEAR

members.name: subtotal
members.doc: Subtotal of all the line items, before tax.

members.name: customMessage
members.doc: Personal note added to the email

members.name: orderId
members.doc: The order this refund related to

members.name: payments
members.doc:
Refund operations information
Currently, only *one* payment refund is supported per request

members.name: restockInfo
members.doc: How to restock items as part of this refund

members.name: sendOrderRefundedEmail
members.doc: Should send a confirmation mail to the customer

members.name: orderTransactions
members.doc: All order's transactions after the refunds were added

members.name: status
members.doc:
Payment status.
One of:
APPROVED,
AUTHORIZED,
CANCELED,
DECLINED,
PARTIALLY_REFUNDED,
PENDING,
PENDING_MERCHANT,
REFUNDED,
UNDEFINED

members.name: orderTransactions
members.doc: Order ID and its associated transactions after update.

members.name: source
members.doc:
Invoice source
One of:
UNSPECIFIED_INVOICE_SOURCE,
WIX

members.name: externalRefund
members.doc: Whether refund was made externally (on the payment provider's side).

members.name: paymentProviderTransactionId
members.doc: Payment provider transaction ID. Used to find refund transaction info on the payment provider's side.

members.name: reason
members.doc: Reason for refund, given by user (optional).

members.name: type
members.doc:
tax type
One of:
CNPJ,
CPF,
UNSPECIFIED_TAX_TYPE
